comments.body: is this file moved from other place? it shows as an add here, which makes it hard to see the diff

This file was indeed added because previously, the LRU lookup was tested in [/kubernetes/plugin/pkg/admission/resourcequota/admission_test.go](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/61774cd7176cae0c0324d23ab20e6c6b3038153f/plugin/pkg/admission/resourcequota/admission_test.go#L799) but due to the move out and the inaccessibility of the struct `quotaAccessor`, I added the LRU lookup test case to this new test file.

in the admission_test.go, the test case is TestAdmitPodInNamespaceWithoutQuota? what about adding the access to quotaAccessor just for the testing purpose? then you may keep the test case there, instead of adding a new one here.
ok. so this is testing the cache hit case, probably better to add a cache miss case too.
